emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '1 stk løg' is best matched with 'løg' because it is the most direct and least processed form of onion available in the database. This aligns with the principle of choosing the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.

The ingredient '3 fed hvidløg' is best matched with 'hvidløg' as it represents the raw, unprocessed form of garlic, which is the most appropriate match given no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.

The ingredient '400 g risotto ris' is a type of rice. Among the available options, 'ris, parboiled' is the most suitable match as it is a general category for processed rice, which risotto rice falls under. This choice aligns with using a broader category when an exact match is not available.
The ingredient '2 dl hvidvin' is directly matched to 'hvidvin' as it is an exact match and represents the least processed form of white wine among the given options.

The ingredient '400 g flåede tomater' is best matched with 'tomat, flået, konserves' because 'flåede tomater' implies a processed, canned form of tomatoes, which directly corresponds to the 'konserves' (canned) description.
The ingredient '25 g tomatpuré' is best matched with 'tomatpure, koncentreret' as it is an exact match and reflects the concentrated nature of tomato paste.

The ingredient '9 dl grøntsagsbouillon' is a liquid, ready-to-use vegetable broth. While there isn't an exact match for 'grøntsagsbouillon, spiseklar', 'bouillon, hønsekød, spiseklar' and 'bouillon, oksekød, spiseklar' are both 'ready-to-eat' (spiseklar) broths. Since 'grøntsagsbouillon' is a vegetable-based broth, and there is no direct vegetable broth option, it is most reasonable to match it to a 'ready-to-eat' broth. Between the two 'spiseklar' options, 'bouillon, oksekød, spiseklar' has a higher emission factor (0.6 kg CO2e / kg) compared to 'bouillon, hønsekød, spiseklar' (0.4 kg CO2e / kg). Therefore, 'bouillon, oksekød, spiseklar' is chosen to provide a conservative estimate, as it is a ready-to-eat broth and has the highest emissions among the viable 'ready-to-eat' options.

The ingredient '25 g soltørrede tomater i olie' is best matched with 'soltørrede tomater' or 'tomat, soltørret'. Both options represent dried tomatoes, which is the primary characteristic of the ingredient. Since both have the same emission factor, either is a suitable match. 'soltørrede tomater' is chosen as it is a direct and concise match.
The ingredient '125 g parmesan' is best matched with 'parmesan ost, 32+' as it is an exact match for parmesan cheese.
The ingredient '0.5 øko citron' is best matched with 'citron' as it is a direct and unprocessed form of the ingredient.
The ingredient '1 spsk olivenolie' is best matched with 'olivenolie' as it is an exact and direct match for the ingredient.

The ingredient '1 stk burrata' is a type of fresh Italian cheese, similar to mozzarella. Therefore, 'mozzarella ost, 30+' is the most appropriate broader category match, as it is a similar type of cheese with a comparable production process and CO2 emissions.
The ingredient '25 g pesto' is best matched with 'pesto' as it is an exact and direct match for the ingredient.
The ingredient '25 g parmesan' is best matched with 'parmesan ost, 32+' as it is an exact match for parmesan cheese.

The ingredient '0.5 håndfuld basilikum' is best matched with 'basilikum, frisk' as it represents the fresh, unprocessed form of basil, which is the most appropriate match given no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.
